channel.title: Quest interface?
channel.description: Okay so i added like 10 different quest to my server both custom and orignals as well but I dont know how to get it to show up in the quest interface like whenver I start a quest I can click on the name of the quest Pops there goes the interface so i can see where to go next how would I get that going someone please explain to me

item.title: Quest interface?
item.dc:creator: @jackfrost890 jackfrost890
item.description:
@jackfrost890 wrote:

will do sk8ter! bro you always help me out man wish i could repay you

Read full topic

item.title: Quest interface?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There’s a packet to handle the text color… SMH.
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Interface_color

It was basically made for the quest system. Use it.

Read full topic

Okay sounds good ima try it out and post the feedback

item.title: Quest interface?
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

You have to split the quest up in parts.
For example:

if (c.quest1 == 0){ //Not started getPA().sendFrame126("@red@The lost city", 7332); //red } else if (c.quest1 == 1){ //Started getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@The lost city", 7332); //yellow } else if (c.quest1 == 2){ //Finished getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@The lost city", 7332); //Green }

I’m sure there are better ways…
Yet i use this one.

Don’t forget to declare this into Player.java:

Then where the first part of the quest comes, like when you click ‘Accept quest’ in a dialogue…
Under the method in clickingbuttons.java, add this:

Then when you reach to the last part, under the action method, where it gives you a reward or something, add this:

That should do it.

This is the interface i use:

[spoiler]
case 28164:
c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.flushOutStream();
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Combat Achievements", 8144);
if (c.strongwarrior == 0) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Strong Warrior", 8148);
} if (c.strongwarrior == 1) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Strong Warrior", 8148);
} if (c.strongwarrior == 2) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Strong Warrior", 8148);
}
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Reward: 150.000", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Objective: Gain 99 Strength", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(" “, 8151);
if (c.swordfighter == 0) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126(”@red@Sword Fighter", 8152);
} if (c.swordfighter == 1) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Sword Fighter", 8152);
} if (c.swordfighter == 2) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Sword Fighter", 8152);
}
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Reward: 150.000", 8153);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@Objective: Gain 99 Attack", 8154);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(" “, 8155);
